FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Everything you need to know about Nexty AI Image and our AI-powered editing platform.

items.question: What makes Nexty AI Image different from other AI image editors?
items.answer: Nexty AI Image uses advanced context-aware AI that understands spatial relationships, lighting, and style consistency. This results in more natural, professional-looking edits compared to other platforms.

items.question: How long does image processing take?
items.answer: Most edits are completed in 10-30 seconds. Our optimized AI pipeline is up to 8x faster than competing platforms while maintaining superior quality.

items.question: What file formats are supported?
items.answer: We support JPG, PNG, and WEBP formats for input. You can export your results in PNG or JPG format. Maximum file size is 5MB per image.

items.question: Is there a limit to how many edits I can make?
items.answer: You can make unlimited edits as long as you have credits. Each single image edit costs 10 credits, and multi-image fusion also costs 10 credits.

items.question: Can I use the images for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Yes! All images created with Nexty AI Image include full commercial usage rights. Perfect for businesses, marketing, and professional projects.

items.question: How secure are my uploaded images?
items.answer: We prioritize your privacy and security. All images are processed securely and stored with enterprise-grade protection. Only you have access to your images.
